TopicTitle: Strange thing I found in KSP [Modded]

Articles.Content:
I went onto my (heavily) modded KSP installation, and found this guy, doing something really stupid.

http://imgur.com/JQJTsao

I mean, what? Could it be caused by one of my mods? Why is his helmet off? Where'd the shovel model come from?
This is an Easter Egg and comes with the toolbar Mod. Thats the helmets are off could be the evidence thats the Mun Landing was a fake - filmed on Kerbin
Well, since the Toolbar causes this, the helmet off thing must be Texture Replacer or something thinking he's on Kerbin.
There's a bunch of threads about this. It is the Toolbar, it has nothing to do with texture replacer. It is a neat easter egg, though.
